name: Kiril Morozov
story: Kiril Morozov grew up in a small village in western Russia. After his parents died in a car accident, he turned to a life of petty crime to survive. He was eventually recruited by the notorious Wagner Group as a mercenary and has been working for them ever since. Kiril has a reputation for being a hot-headed and unpredictable fighter, but his superiors know they can count on him in a pinch.
